p: Overall, the net cooling effects of NO x and NH 3 are short-lived and NO x even plays a warming role on the long timescale. Nonetheless, the multiple environmental problems resulting from NO x and NH 3, such as air pollution, eutrophication, etc., are more remarkable than the climate impact in China. In this regard, it is important to assess the trade-offs between the environmental and climate effects of the Nr compounds in the future studies.
